abstract: Systems and methods for assigning or computing a fire system safety score via data mining and for predictive analysis via data mining are provided. Some methods can include identifying one or more pieces of data information from an ambient condition monitoring system installed in a region, quantifying the one or more pieces of the data information, and identifying a safety score of the region based on the quantified one or more pieces of the data information.
summary: <SOH> BRIEF DESCRIPTION OF THE DRAWINGS <EOH>FIG. 1 is a flow diagram of a method in accordance with disclosed embodiments. detailed-description description="Detailed Description" end="lead"?
title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR ASSIGNING A FIRE SYSTEM SAFETY SCORE AND FOR PREDICTIVE ANALYSIS VIA DATA MINING
